captions.text: The pad thai, number one stir fry noodle in Thailand
Before dry one you can soak with warm water, allow ten minutes, easy when you cook
Easy when you have the prawn, I show for you
Here you can squeeze in the head and squeeze here
Your prawn head really good for the noodle have colour
Stir fry red onion to smell
You have a look the prawn head have beautiful colour
The prawn not cooked too long time
The rice noodle cook allow 1 to 2 minute
Thai people in Bangkok love sweet and then you don’t like sweet too much you can add a little bit
Sweet radish in, allow one tablespoon
And then I use water for cooking
How you know the noodle are ready, you can use long handle
Check the noodle, the noodles sticky? Not yet cook allow few minutes
The egg you can cook outside in the fry pan
Someone not understand put in the egg, mix together, now sticky not beautiful
Looking for the egg right, mix everything now
Someone not like cook a little bit, someone loves the beansprout cook this long time
And Chilli powder, be careful not add a lot, a little bit

title: How to Make Classic Pad Thai | Cooking with Poo

comments.text: The should have just spelled her name as Pooh instead of Poo﻿
comments.author: DARINBOMZY21

comments.text:
What are those mushrooms (I believe that they are mushrooms) that are black 
or very dark dark brown. Sometimes they are prepared with Asian dishes and 
they look like ribbons almost, the way they are prepared. They have a 
snappy springy texture to them. Snappier than most cooked mushrooms. I 
thought maybe they might be black trumpet mushrooms but I am unsure.﻿

You can. We dont fix our dishes. You can change from shrimp to what you 
like or even skip that part. If you order it here in Thailand, you might 
find super small dry shrimps instead though.

comments.author: Mimi

comments.text:
I just realised something. 'Chompoo', or rose apple, is also 'jambu' in 
Malay. In Malaysia/Singapore, it's used colloquially to describe someone 
who is hawt..like really attractive. So way to go, Poo! Awesome choice for 
a nickname!﻿

comments.author: Kelly Truong

comments.text:
I've been searching for new and exciting dishes to cook for my clients and 
this light pad thai looks absolutely perfect! I'll be trying it tomorrow. 
Watching Poo work is beautiful. As with Jamie, she is so in control and 
confident. I love to watch people cook with less precision and more passion 
and this video was an absolute pleasure! Looks like I'll be spending the 
rest of my afternoon on this channel. ﻿

Who in their right mind does that?﻿
